name: Borel conjecture
rephrased: The fundamental group determines the topology of a closed aspherical manifold.
implication_form: If two closed aspherical manifolds have isomorphic fundamental groups, then they are homeomorphic.
explained: The Bore, essentially claiming that the fundamental group determines the homeomorphism type for closed aspherical manifolds.
related_conjectures: Rigidity conjectures in other contexts (e.g., Mostow rigidity theorem)
